param.name: input_0
param.description: First input you will use to update an instance of your type. This would typically be something like an ID or Name. Add other inputs to facilitate the update of the relevant instance.

workflow-note.description: Add your logic here to update an existing instance of your type in the relevant system using REST / SOAP / SQL / SSH etc. You may need to create additional inputs on this workflow to facilitate the update of the relevant properties of the instance of your type in this context.
